channel.title: SparkEd Blog
channel.description: The best place to stay up-to-date with the latest SparkEd news and events.

item.title: SparkEd Release
item.description:
We are pleased to let you know that we will soon be releasing version 1.0.0 of our SparkEd platform.

Project was inspired from working on a variety of educational programs in sub-Saharan Africa over the past decade where lack of access to education
